name: Liberation

trigger.text: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's leaders and characters, negate its effect for this turn.

text: Main: If you have 2 or more characters less than your opponent, KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with an original cost of 6 or less and one with an original cost of 4 or less. Trigger: Choose up to 1 of your opponent's leaders and characters, negate its effect for this turn.

effect.text: If you have 2 or more characters less than your opponent, KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with an original cost of 6 or less and one with an original cost of 4 or less.
Choose up to 1 of your opponent's leaders and characters, negate its effect for this turn.
